questions.question_text: How often do Defenders share logs with Console?
In Prisma Cloud Software Release 22.06 (Kepler), which Registry type is added?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B --> You can now scan Google Artifact Registries using Prisma Cloud Compute.

https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/22-06/prisma-cloud-compute-edition-release-notes/release-information/release-notes-22-06

Selected Answer: B
Google Artifact Registry
https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/22-06/prisma-cloud-compute-edition-release-notes/release-information/release-notes-22-06

questions.question_text: Which three actions are required in order to use the automated method within Azure Cloud to streamline the process of using remediation in the identity and access management (IAM) module? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
C --> Integrate Prisma Cloud with Azure Serve Bus
B --> Configure and Run Azure IAM Remediation Script
E --> The other two libraries are requests and azure.servicebus which are 3rd party libraries—or—libraries that you have to install before running the script.

https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/prisma-cloud-admin/prisma-cloud-iam-security/remediate-alerts-for-iam-security

questions.question_text: Which two roles have access to view the Prisma Cloud policies? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
The Defender Manager role:

✅ Can manage Defenders and their configurations.
❌ Does not have full access to all security policies.
❌ Cannot manage or view policies related to vulnerabilities, compliance, etc.
Therefore, it is not one of the core roles with permissions to view general Prisma Cloud policies.

Selected Answer: BC
B --> Auditor --> Auditors get read-only access to all Prisma Cloud data, settings, and logs.
C --> DevSecOps User --> Read-only access to all results under Radar and Monitor, but no access to change policy or settings.

https://github.com/PaloAltoNetworks/prisma-cloud-docs/blob/master/compute/admin_guide/authentication/user_roles.adoc

BD seems correct
according to Doc https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/prisma-cloud-admin-compute/authentication/prisma_cloud_user_roles
DevSecOps User-
**Read-only access to all results under Radar and Monitor, but No access to View or change Policy or settings.**
